kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Start Process
kw.doc: Starts a new process on background.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=jupyter-server, url=http://127.0.0.1:9999, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: Get On Session
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: GET Request : url=http://127.0.0.1:9999/api/status path_url=/api/status headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.25.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None

kw.name: Terminate Process
kw.doc: Stops the process gracefully or forcefully.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Get Variable Value
kw.doc: Returns variable value or ``default`` if the variable does not exist.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Start Process
kw.doc: Starts a new process on background.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=jupyter-server, url=http://127.0.0.1:8888, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: Get On Session
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: GET Request : url=http://127.0.0.1:8888/api/status path_url=/api/status headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.25.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the specific ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until ``locator`` element is displayed on web page.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Capture current web page as image png file.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser

kw.name: Terminate Process
kw.doc: Stops the process gracefully or forcefully.

kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
